Package com.mele.games.hex.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IHexRenderable
    Desribes anything which can be painted into a hex.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CellRenderer
    Isolates the rendering logic for cells from the underlying game logic content.
    DefaultHexListener  
    HexArrayController
    Responsible for synchronizing the state between the Model (HexArray) and View (HexArrayRenderer)
    HexArrayRenderer
    Responsible for drawing the contents of the hex array (the main game board).
    HexEventDetail  
    HexInputListener
    Listens for mouse clicks on the display window and queues them as commands to the game.
    HexInputState  
    Manual_Test  
    Renderer_Test

    Enum Description
    EHexEventCategory  
    EHexEventType
